abstract: The Linux programmers at the chip maker are at the center of its foray into netbooks and mobile phones.
snippet: The Linux programmers at the chip maker are at the center of its foray into netbooks and mobile phones.
lead_paragraph: SANTA CLARA, Calif.  Intel has worked hard and spent a lot of money over the years to shape its image: It is the company that celebrates its quest to make computer chips ever smaller, faster and cheaper with a quick five-note jingle at the end of its commercials.

headline.main: Intel Adopts an Identity in Software
headline.print_headline: Intel Adopts An Identity In Software
